hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that ReDead and Gibdo have their own version of Sun's Song that freezes you?

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a grotto full of #spider webs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #Saria's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path of #gold#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Huge Pit Silver Rupee Ceiling Lower

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Map of the Shadow Temple# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Light Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Dead Hand surrounded by Bomb Flowers# guards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Bomb Flower Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #4# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?

ToT (Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #the Temple of Time#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.
